title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Louis Riddick on Seahawks Rebuild, Tua Turnaround, NFL Future
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Louis Riddick on Seahawks Rebuild, Tua Turnaround, NFL Future
description:
Colin rants on why Dak isn't living up to his monster contract (3:00), and what the outrage over Brian Kelly leaving Notre Dame says about college football fans (6:00). Then, Monday Night Football analyst and former NFL exec Louis Riddick and Colin discuss who's to blame for the Giants' debacle (10:00), if the Seahawks are headed for a total tear down or just a quick reboot (14:00), why Louis thinks Tua deserves much more credit than he's getting (18:00), the uncertain future of the NFL QB market and why it's going to keep changing (25:00), and if he sees himself leaving the MNF broadcast booth to get back into an NFL front office (30:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
